attributes.action: register a miscarraige as a life as a baby!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i recently started a group on facebook. after my miscarraige it was a great help talking to people in the same position as me. but there i one topic that were all talking about is the fact that out babys were not classed as babys. to any mum who gets pregnant its a baby from when u find out!! this needs to change our babys are babys to us no matter what any one says they need to be reconised as babys!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "register a miscarraige as a life as a baby!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19901


Prime Minister's Office
